name: Into The Bog (SC0URG3, Maribell, Noccifer, Ray Noodle)
name_original: Into The Bog (SC0URG3, Maribell, Noccifer, Ray Noodle)
description:
The young Alexander DeMontegue has snuck out at night, ignoring his parents' warnings, and ventured forth into the nearby marshlands in search of his missing brother Archibald. Upon arriving, he finds the peculiar Mr. Carey standing watch at the docks. With the restless spirits of the bog stirring during the full moon, the search for what became of your younger brother will be perilous. Be safe, and keep your eyes open!

A Survival-Horror group assignment for the IVGD program at Dawson College:

Bryan Internoscia - Technical Artist, Animator, Voice of Mr. Carey
Marianne Perignon - 3d Artist, Story Dialogue, Animator, UI, Voice Acting (Archibald and ghosts)
Ray Nadeau - Environment Artist
Steven Steffen - Art Director, Level Design, Sound Design, Audio
Julien Escobar - Technical Director, AI Programming
Pierre-Luc Lapointe - Creative Director, Narrative Design, Character Programming, QA

Controls:
WASD - Movement
E - Interact
F - Get in the ferry
R - Disembark the ferry
T - Tutorial window
Tab - Inventory
Esc - Menu
